description: This is a Java class definition for a Data Transfer Object (DTO) named Transaction, used to encapsulate transaction data including id, amount, associated bank account, and reference number.

classes.name: Transaction
classes.description: A DTO representing a financial transaction with fields for id, amount, bank account, and reference number.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Accessor for the transaction's unique identifier.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Mutator for setting the transaction's unique identifier.

methods.name: setAmount
methods.description: Mutator for setting the transaction amount.

methods.name: getBankAccount
methods.description: Accessor for the associated BankAccount object.

methods.name: setBankAccount
methods.description: Mutator for setting the associated BankAccount object.

methods.name: getReferenceNumber
methods.description: Accessor for the transaction reference number.

methods.name: setReferenceNumber
methods.description: Mutator for setting the transaction reference number.
